KPS Essentials Superfood Elixir  (2020 formulation)

Brand: KPS Essentials

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: *Argania Spinosa (Argan) Kernel Oil, *Punica Granatum Seed Oil (Pomegranate) Oil, *Olea europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Our Oils are infused with *Theobroma Cacao (Cacao) Powder, *Curcuma Longa (Turmeric) Root Powder, *Rosa c

Root Powder, *Rosa canina (Rosehip) Fruit Powder, and *Myristica fragrans (Nutmeg) Powder. *Proprietary Blend of Essential Oils. *Organic Ingredients

Ingredient concerns: LOW: Cancer, Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity, Use Restrictions
